name: Rabbids Go Home
description:
The Rabbids’ first comedy-adventure will take them to the moon or bust!

As usual, they have an infallible plan: Collect all the human Stuff they can find, heap it onto a giant Pile and climb to the moon… Not so fast! The Humans revolt and become Verminators to exterminate the Rabbid varmints and defend their precious Stuff: ‘Rabbids Go Home!’
